channel.title: VenomousX - 637/639 - A Basic yet an Enjoyable Experience!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img191/7939/gbpu.png[/img]
Welcome to VenomousX, a new growing server, that is ready to Compete with the best. All though I would say there is nothing special about us, I have been told by very few players, that we do have some sort of uniqueness, so that is why I have come here to present VenomousX to everyone in this Community. So if you feel you are looking for an experience to remember, just check us out, we aren't asking for you to stay, just to give us a chance. I also advise you to leave as much feedback as possible, whether its the most negative, racist, rude thing you can think of, or if its the most descriptive, constructive and meaningful vocabulary you can think of. So if you are willing to check us out, please visit us at:
[img]http://www.malayaly.xtgem.com/images/Site%20image/icon_small_home.gif[/img][URL=http://"http://venomousx.com"]Home[/URL] [img]http://www.softrak.com/images/forum_ico.png[/img][URL=http://"http://venomousx.com/forum"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://venomousx.com/vote"]Vote[/URL] [URL=http://"http://venomousx.com/donate"]Donate[/URL] [img]http://www.rogercpareview.com/media/images/layout/play-iconB2_small.png[/img][URL=http://"http://venomousx.com/webclient"]Webclient[/URL] [img]http://iconizer.net/files/Splashyfish/orig/document_small_download.png[/img][URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/zmywlpwbb66pmd4/VenomousX-2.1.jar"]Download Client[/URL] Video made by 'Parry'/'Cud' One of our players. [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UtG3w9iroP4[/youtube]
Since we are only new, we still have a lot of updates to come, so enjoy what we have and what is to come.
[URL=http://www.venomousx.com][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img163/5610/wev2.png[/img][/URL][/spoiler] Media [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img841/4812/3gnl.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img42/2953/57yr.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img809/130/rbnr.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img706/329/99zy.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img546/6610/bjdc.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img18/1045/o5n6.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img21/8669/h8cu.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img833/2536/5ah2.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img42/9084/9vyy.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img7/2967/vmy5.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img844/4865/37fz.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img21/1244/lfko.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img829/6855/xjen.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img6/9439/3ue1.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img13/8233/mury.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img4/7702/22d6.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img46/1518/rnj7.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img856/9635/hkrh.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img829/6108/qppb.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img819/5063/7v2i.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img838/4551/hdbc.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img823/9853/kz1y.png[/img]
Features ~90% Prestige System ~Barrows Brother mini game - including maze ~80% CastleWars Minigame ~70% Summoning Skill ~Custom Farming Skill ~Donator Zone ~Safe PvP Zone ~Custom Information Tab ~Completely custom Rank System ~Dupes Fixed ~Unique Home ~All Skills trainable except for Construction & Dungeoneering (They are coming soon) ~Pk Point System ~Advanced Kill Streak & Kill Streak Reward system ~Automatic Vote reward claiming with Vote points ~Automatic Donation package Claiming ~Corporeal Beast ~Nex ~All GwD bosses (Avanchies coming soon) ~Revenants (coming soon) ~Skywyrms ~Bronze+ Dragons ~Slayer ~Slayer teleports ~Nice Teleport interfaces ~Pk Point & Vote point store ~Kill Count titles (Earn the mobilising army titles through kills in the wilderness) ~Jad Minigame ~Armour Set exchanging ~All Armour effects and shield effects functional ~Lunars (not all spells are complete) ~Ancients ~Curses (fully functional, including leeches) ~Crystal Key chest ~Fairy Ring system (not being utilised at the moment) ~Bones to altar ~Bonfires ~Flax picking ~Flax spinning ~Thieving stalls ~Skill-cape purchasing ~Experience Locking ~Correct KDR Calculation ~Automatic Information tab updating ~potion on potion refilling ~Custom Godsword creation ~Christmas Cracker ~Mystery box ~Crystal Key Chest ~Players online interface (utilised by a scoreboard object instead of a command) ~Player Kill count and Death count ~Account Saving & Loading ~Perfected Dice rolling ~Clan chat system ~Customisable Private chat ~And much much more~ ~Nearly all Map data added.
If you wish to support us through our servers life time, please wear our support signature. Support Signatures [url=http://imageshack.us/a/img202/7166/26d3.png]http://imageshack.us/a/img202/7166/26d3.png[/url] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img202/7166/26d3.png[/img]
[url=http://imageshack.us/a/img854/8307/9m16.png]http://imageshack.us/a/img854/8307/9m16.png[/url] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img854/8307/9m16.png[/img]
[/CENTER] We are only a new community, and may not have much players on all the time, so please help us increase our population, and make it a more enjoyable experience! Thank you for visiting our official thread, please leave some feedback! Please remember to give credits for the creation of this server to these people. CREDITS: [URL=http://www.rune-server.org/members/format/]Format[/URL] [URL=http://www.rune-server.org/members/magnito/]Magnito[/URL] [URL=http://www.rune-server.org/members/lumby/]Lumby[/URL] [URL=http://www.rune-server.org/members/%27mystic+flow/]'Mystic Flow[/URL] [URL=http://www.rune-server.org/members/sinatra/]Sinatra[/URL] (I ripped Barrows brothers/Castlewars/crystal key chest, from his source)

item.title: VenomousX - 637/639 - A Basic yet an Enjoyable Experience!
item.dc:creator: @ggson ggson
item.description:
@ggson wrote:

[CENTER]

Welcome to VenomousX, a new growing server, that is ready to Compete with the best. All though I would say there is nothing special about us, I have been told by very few players, that we do have some sort of uniqueness, so that is why I have come here to present VenomousX to everyone in this Community. So if you feel you are looking for an experience to remember, just check us out, we aren’t asking for you to stay, just to give us a chance. I also advise you to leave as much feedback as possible, whether its the most negative, racist, rude thing you can think of, or if its the most descriptive, constructive and meaningful vocabulary you can think of. So if you are willing to check us out, please visit us at:

[URL=http://“http://venomousx.com”]Home[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://venomousx.com/forum”]Forums[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://venomousx.com/vote”]Vote[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://venomousx.com/donate”]Donate[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://venomousx.com/webclient”]Webclient[/URL]
[URL=http://“https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/zmywlpwbb66pmd4/VenomousX-2.1.jar”]Download Client[/URL]
Video made by ‘Parry’/‘Cud’ One of our players.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UtG3w9iroP4[/youtube]

Since we are only new, we still have a lot of updates to come, so enjoy what we have and what is to come.

[URL=http://www.venomousx.com][/URL][/spoiler]
Media





















Features
~90% Prestige System
~Barrows Brother mini game - including maze
~80% CastleWars Minigame
~70% Summoning Skill
~Custom Farming Skill
~Donator Zone
~Safe PvP Zone
~Custom Information Tab
~Completely custom Rank System
~Dupes Fixed
~Unique Home
~All Skills trainable except for Construction & Dungeoneering (They are coming soon)
~Pk Point System
~Advanced Kill Streak & Kill Streak Reward system
~Automatic Vote reward claiming with Vote points
~Automatic Donation package Claiming
~Corporeal Beast
~Nex
~All GwD bosses (Avanchies coming soon)
~Revenants (coming soon)
~Skywyrms
~Bronze+ Dragons
~Slayer
~Slayer teleports
~Nice Teleport interfaces
~Pk Point & Vote point store
~Kill Count titles (Earn the mobilising army titles through kills in the wilderness)
~Jad Minigame
~Armour Set exchanging
~All Armour effects and shield effects functional
~Lunars (not all spells are complete)
~Ancients
~Curses (fully functional, including leeches)
~Crystal Key chest
~Fairy Ring system (not being utilised at the moment)
~Bones to altar
~Bonfires
~Flax picking
~Flax spinning
~Thieving stalls
~Skill-cape purchasing
~Experience Locking
~Correct KDR Calculation
~Automatic Information tab updating
~potion on potion refilling
~Custom Godsword creation
~Christmas Cracker
~Mystery box
~Crystal Key Chest
~Players online interface (utilised by a scoreboard object instead of a command)
~Player Kill count and Death count
~Account Saving & Loading
~Perfected Dice rolling
~Clan chat system
~Customisable Private chat
~And much much more~
~Nearly all Map data added.

If you wish to support us through our servers life time, please wear our support signature.
Support Signatures
http://imageshack.us/a/img202/7166/26d3.png

http://imageshack.us/a/img854/8307/9m16.png

[/CENTER]
We are only a new community, and may not have much players on all the time, so please help us increase our population, and make it a more enjoyable experience!
Thank you for visiting our official thread, please leave some feedback!
Please remember to give credits for the creation of this server to these people.

[URL=http://www.rune-server.org/members/magnito/]Magnito[/URL]

[URL=http://www.rune-server.org/members/%27mystic+flow/]'Mystic Flow[/URL]
[URL=http://www.rune-server.org/members/sinatra/]Sinatra[/URL] (I ripped Barrows brothers/Castlewars/crystal key chest, from his source)
